Summary: Saw fast decending blue/white ball in sky
divs: Sighting DetailsA group of friends and I were sitting on our front porch talking, when I noticedan object decending at about a 45 degree angle, heading north. The ball waswhite in color, then turned blue, then back to white before disappearing overthe horizon of buildings. The next door neighbors also saw this occurance. Weended up talking about it for quite some time, as we found it quite interesting.
